scenes.title: Understanding Python
scenes.text: Python is a versatile programming language used for web development, data analysis, and more.
scenes.voiceover: Python is a versatile programming language used for web development, data analysis, and more.

title.subtitle: How Python Handles Data
title.narration: In this video, we will explore how Python handles data processing.

blocks.voiceover: The first input is raw data in CSV format.
The second input is a configuration file in JSON format.
The Python script processes the raw data using the configuration file.
The output is the processed data in the form of a Pandas DataFrame.

narration.conclusion: This concludes the Python data processing flow.

scenes.title: How a Web Request Works

interactions.voiceover: The client sends an HTTP request to the server.
The server queries the database for the requested data.
The database returns the requested data to the server.
The server sends the response back to the client.

scenes.voiceover: This sequence diagram illustrates how a web request works.

scenes.title: Applications of Python
scenes.text: Python is widely used in web development, data science, artificial intelligence, and more.
scenes.voiceover: Python is widely used in web development, data science, artificial intelligence, and more.

scenes.title: Python Ecosystem
scenes.voiceover: The Python ecosystem includes libraries and frameworks that interact seamlessly.

events.text: Python was created by Guido van Rossum.
events.narration: In 1991, Python was created by Guido van Rossum.

events.text: Python 2.0 was released with new features.
events.narration: In 2000, Python 2.0 was released with new features.

events.text: Python 3.0 was introduced with major updates.
events.narration: In 2008, Python 3.0 was introduced with major updates.

conclusion.narration: Python continues to evolve and remains a popular programming language.
